com.se_project.controllers - package com.se_project.controllers
 
CourseController - Class in com.se_project.controllers
This class implements the controller functions that link between the course model and its views.
CourseController() - Constructor for class com.se_project.controllers.CourseController
 
CourseForm(Model, String, Course) - Method in class com.se_project.controllers.CourseController
this function takes teacher id and returns HTML page of the course form that is used in creating new course by this teacher
CreateCourse(MultipartFile, String, Course, BindingResult, Model) - Method in class com.se_project.controllers.CourseController
this function takes a course data from a teacher and creates it
CreateMCQGame(MCQGame, BindingResult, Model, String, long, MultipartFile) - Method in class com.se_project.controllers.GameController

CreateTFGameForm(Model, TFGame, String, long) - Method in class com.se_project.controllers.GameController
 
CreateTOrFGame(TFGame, BindingResult, Model, String, long, MultipartFile) - Method in class com.se_project.controllers.GameController
this function takes data of "true or false" game by a teacher and creates it
current_user - Static variable in class com.se_project.controllers.UserController
